SEARCH

Package org.amcp.core

package org.amcp.core
AMCP Core Framework - Agent Mesh Communication Protocol

This package provides the core classes and interfaces for building distributed agent systems using the Agent Mesh Communication Protocol (AMCP).

Key Components

  • Agent - Base class for all AMCP agents
  • Event - Event representation for agent communication
  • AgentContext - Interface for mesh interaction

Basic Usage


 public class MyAgent extends Agent {
     public MyAgent(String id) {
         super(id, "MyAgent");
     }
     
     @Override
     protected void onActivation() {
         subscribe("my.topic.*");
         
         Event event = Event.builder()
             .topic("my.topic.hello")
             .payload("Hello AMCP!")
             .build();
         publish(event);
     }
 }
Since:

  • Class
    Description
    Agent
    Base class for all AMCP agents.
    AgentContext
    Interface for agent context within the AMCP mesh.
    Event
    Represents an event in the AMCP mesh.
    Event.Builder
    Builder for constructing Event instances.
    EventPriority
    Enumeration of event priorities in the AMCP mesh.
